directions: In a skillet, heat oil over medium heat.  Saute mushrooms.
Combine mushrooms, sour cream, cheese, salsa, rice, and chicken.  Place in a greased casserole dish.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 25 to 35 minutes.
ingredients: 8 ounces boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced
title: Oh-So-Good Chicken
